LAST_LOGIN: Last login in date and time {DATE_TIME}
OTP_SENT: We sent a One-Time PIN to your mobile number ending in {4_DIGITS} to confirm this change.
NAME: Name*
TERMS_BOTTON_DESC: By clicking continue, I accept the terms and conditions indicated herewith.
SOCIAL_MEDIA: Sign in using your social media accounts
YOURE_KAKAMPINK: You're now a KakamPink! Share your referral code and earn 100 hero points for each registered member.
CHANGE_PASS_SUCCESS: You have successfully changed your password.
SIGNIN_NEW_PASS: Sign in now with your new password.
SUBJECT: Subject
MESSAGE_SENT_MSG: Your message has been sent and well take a look at it as soon as possible. #PinkyPromise
EARNED_POINTS_OLD: You have earned {POINTS} hero points from recruiting an additional {MEMBERS_COUNT} members!
EARNED_POINTS: You have successfully invited {MEMBERS_COUNT} additional member(s) to be kakampink.
SEE_YOU: See you at {LOCATION} on {DATE}. Wear your pink outfit and tie pink ribbons in your cars.
PLAY_SERVICES_NOT_AVAILABLE: Google play service is not available.
MOBILE_NOT_ALLOWED: Account not allowed! Please use Social Media to login.
ENTER_11_DIGIT_MOBILE: Enter your 11-digit mobile number to proceed retrieving your password.
PRIVACY_BOTTON_DESC: By clicking continue, I accept the data privacy consent indicated herewith.
INVITE_JOIN_CONTENT: Ang Usapang Kakampink Discord server ay para sa mga nahihirapang kumausap sa mga mahal sa buhay tungkol kay Leni Robredo
UPGRADE_ACCOUNT: I want to upgrade my account.
APPLY_COMMUNITY_LEADER: I want to apply as a community leader.
COMMUNITY_CODE_SUCCESS: You are now a community leader.
COMMUNITY_CODE_DESC: Post events, announcements and stories for your community.
COMMUNITY_ABOUT: Tell your members about your community
SET_GOAL: Set a goal. Convert someone to be a Kakampink!
DOWNLOAD_KITS: Start a conversation, we can help. Download conversation kits below:
TASK_INSTRUCTION: Once you received the task, the deadline countdown starts. Complete ahead of time to get more Hero Points and Rewards!
TASK_NOTE: Note:  if the like button is not working. Please click the post image, message, share icon or this link to open the post via Facebook then hit "Like". Once done, click "Done" to earn points.
TASK_COMPLETED: All tasks completed! Come back again later to earn more points.
TASK_MSG_SUCCESS: You have successfully completed the task.
TASK_MSG_FAIL: Please complete the task by following the instructions.
TASKS_NOTIF_CONTENT: Complete tasks to earn more Hero Points! Tap the Task Center icon at the bottom menu and complete as many as you can!
ERRMSG_DOB: You should be at least 18 years old to register.
SETUP_COMMUNITY_PAGE_MSG: You need to setup community before creating events.
ERRMSG_FILESIZE: File / Image too large too upload.
SELFIE_MSG: Take a selfie photo for your avatar. You can update your profile photo at a later time by clicking your photo in the Home page.
NEW_UPDATE_DESC: You will have to update your app to the latest version to continue using Leni 2022.
NAME_MSG: Don't be a stranger and we want to address you properly, please tell us about yourself.
MOBILE_NUMBER_MSG: This is our safe space, assigning a number for OTP helps us keep it TROLL-free.
REFERRAL_CODE_MSG: Did someone invite you? You can use that invite code!
